name: BGP: Dino Cross
description:
Chapter 11 of Beginning Game Programming sets us up with the skills we learned in previous chapters to create a Frogger Clone.

In this game, you play as a Compsognathus (Compy for short), who mission is to make it across the busy trails to the watering hole. Try not to get run over by the other dinos. You score points for each successful crossing. You have three lives.

Use the DPad, Left Analog stick, WASD or Arrow keys to move . Start button or Space to start playing. That is it.

Please note, this game has only been found to work with controllers in the Chrome Browser. Firefox currently does not work. You can use the keyboard in Firefox.
